com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity
 

  • Uses of DestinationProperties in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity

    Subinterfaces of DestinationProperties in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    Destination
    Platform independent representation of a destination as a collection of key-value pairs, can be converted to a HttpDestination or a RfcDestination.
    interface 
    HttpDestination
    Platform independent representation of a HTTP destination as a collection of key-value pairs.
    interface 
    HttpDestinationProperties
    Adds HTTP relevant fields to the "generic" destination.
    interface 
    RfcDestination
    Deprecated.
    Please use Destination instead.
    interface 
    RfcDestinationProperties
    Deprecated.
    Please use DefaultDestination instead.
    Classes in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity that implement DestinationProperties
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    DefaultDestination
    Immutable default implementation of the Destination interface to be used as the "single source of truth".
    final class 
    DefaultHttpDestination
    Immutable default implementation of the HttpDestination interface.
    final class 
    DefaultRfcDestination
    Deprecated.
    Please use DefaultDestination instead.

    Description
    DestinationProperties
    DestinationService.getDestinationProperties(String destinationName)
    Fetches the properties of a specific destination from the BTP Destination Service.
